title: Offering 35 Year Vintage Baseball Card Collection
author: vwtdi

posts.post_title: Offering 35 Year Vintage Baseball Card Collection
posts.post_content:
I find myself in a position where I need to fund the purchase of a house in the next several months. This is not going to be a fire sale of my collection, but if you’ve been wanting to get a special card or have had your eye on a particular card in my collection and are willing to pay the price, we’ll be able to do business. I’m fielding legitimate offers on any card in my collection by email until midnight March 31st. If I’m happy with your offer I’ll email you letting you know we can talk turkey....if I’m not (although I’ll acknowledge all offers with a thank you, appreciated email response), you won’t hear anything after March 31st. This won’t be an auction with questions as to what the current high offer is on a particular card, all I want from anyone who has a serious interest in a card is an email stating which card they’re interested in and what their top offer is on the card. Take your time, give careful thought and put your best foot forward once. I’d like to get enough money together for a nice sized down payment by selling 5-10 bigger money cards and keeping the rest. I’ll be happy to answer questions about a card’s condition and all sales proceeds will go towards the purchase of a house for Keith. Thanks in advance, here is a link to the cards being offered...
 
If you see a card you can’t do without, now is a good time to try prying it out of me.
 
[url]http://s45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/56%20card%20baseball%20collection/[/url]
 
Keith [url]Snoopy525@Embarqmail.com[/url]
beautiful collection, Keith!  good luck with your new house!  :)
